column1: Today we gather with family friends and loved ones to celebrate the many blessings in our lives. From the Rutherford family to yours may you enjoy a safe and bountiful Thanksgiving! #Thanksgiving2020 https://t.co/hbG3llJSi5

The Jacksonville South Social Security Office is getting a new address! The Social Security office at 7185 Bonneval Road is changing its address to 7185 Bentley Road effective December 3. A reminder that many of their services are also offered online here: https://t.co/sLGk7Ya2ey
Operation Warp Speed is on target to deliver a coronavirus vaccine for the American people. Watch below for more! https://t.co/tVCk5UjbuV

On my way back to Washington I was given the opportunity to check out TSA’s new scanning technology at @JAXairport. Thank you to the men and women of the @TSA who are working hard every day to keep our nation safe! https://t.co/Rn8qlAVVwa
Wishing all who celebrate a Happy Diwali! #Diwali2020 https://t.co/1TQJ8bnUhi

Thank you to the Rotary Club of Ponte Vedra Beach for hosting me today. We discussed how to support America's economic recovery how Congress can assist local businesses as the COVID-19 pandemic continues and what it means to live the Rotary motto of “Service Above Self.” https://t.co/3bWAP2eTGH

Today on #VeteransDay I am remembering my father James Rutherford (USN) Uncle E.J. Rutherford (USN) and father-in-law Joe Carroll (USMC). Among them includes service in WW2 Korea and Vietnam. I thank them and the entire veteran community for their service and sacrifice. https://t.co/8ecbBN8rhY

It was an honor to attend the Mayor's #VeteransDay Parade Breakfast this morning in Jacksonville. Thank you to America's heroes who have served our country and safeguarded our freedoms for generations. We owe them our gratitude today and every day. https://t.co/WsLVHXpsQc

Happy Birthday to the @USMC! Northeast Florida is proudly home to Marine Corps Support Facility Blount Island in Jacksonville. Thank you to all both past and present who have earned the title of United States Marine. #HappyBirthdayMarines https://t.co/L8iWLB0prP
Open Enrollment has begun and will end December 15th. To find coverage and shop plans please click on the link below.  https://t.co/hXapfUg2BB

Today is the virtual Walk to End Alzheimer’s in Jacksonville. Unfortunately we can’t be in person together this year but I want to take a moment to thank all volunteers and walkers who are working to #ENDAlz. https://t.co/yvxd71d685

I'm humbled by this recognition from @sandyhook Promise for my bipartisan work with @RepTedDeutch to keep kids safe in school. The #STOPSchoolViolenceAct has already delivered $300m to school districts across America. Thanks to @sandyhook for all their work to make schools safer. https://t.co/OVQT0N13ft

The American economy led by @realDonaldTrump is roaring back! GDP grew at a 33.1% annual rate over the last quarter shattering expectations & pointing to a strong recovery from COVID-19 shutdowns.  We must keep our economy open and continue this boom into the new year!
ICYMI: Bipartisanship gets results! Thank you to @realDonaldTrump for listening to Floridians from both parties to close our beaches to offshore drilling. https://t.co/dL8cgRUsQ9

Great to join @EPAAWheeler to celebrate the completion of a superfund cleanup project in Jacksonville which is now safe for community use. In just one year the EPA removed 60k tons of contaminated soil added 60k tons of clean soil & removed 300k gallons of contaminated water. https://t.co/x6uZMgXtRX

Thank you for asking. Here’s a brief list of the major wins I’ve helped secure for Northeast Florida as a member of the House Appropriations Committee in a “Democratic Congress.” Hope you sign up for my newsletter to stay up to date on my work in Congress! https://t.co/nnizMwxMym https://t.co/nJEKKavthN https://t.co/9KgS7gHnsj

Our community can take a lot of pride in the growth we are seeing at the Port of Fernandina. Last year I supported its designation as part of the federal Marine Highway program and now I am thrilled to help secure this $6.55 million federal investment. https://t.co/6FVONcx4S3
Thank you for having me on a fun and informative #RutherfordRideAlong! https://t.co/kjw1QVkqjH

I'm proud to be named the 2nd most bipartisan representative in Florida & a top bipartisan member of Congress. In D.C. I’ve developed friendships & working relationships across the aisle found common ground & compromised without compromising my values. https://t.co/xEiX6lZiYX

While we've made progress lung cancer still accounts for more deaths than colon cancer breast cancer & prostate cancer combined. This resolution seeks to increase detection & diagnosis of lung cancer by promoting the awareness availability & importance of early screening.

Proud to join @CongBoyle to introduce legislation designating November as Lung Cancer Awareness Month. As co-chair of the Lung Cancer Caucus and member of @HouseAppropsGOP I'm committed to supporting investments in research & access to treatment. https://t.co/sXUJo7j6Tu

Happy Birthday to NAS Jacksonville! Northeast Florida is so proud of our strong naval tradition and the incredible contributions our installations like NAS Jax make to our national security. https://t.co/H1a0bBzfxg

Outstanding! With this new law we ensure everyone who walks into that facility remembers the life legacy and bravery of Private First Class Chase. Thank you to all who supported & advocated for this legislation especially @RepMichaelWaltz @SenRickScott & @marcorubio. https://t.co/CyYbxlV9xl

Happy Birthday to the @USNavy! Northeast Florida is proudly home to NAS Jacksonville NS Mayport and thousands of Sailors and their families. Thank you to all Sailors both past and present for their brave service to America. #navy245 #NavyBirthday https://t.co/8LQFXpCM0v

Excited to announce there are SIX new cosponsors on my bipartisan legislation to protect Northeast Florida's many natural resources historical sites & cultural landscapes.   Thank you @RepGregSteube @RepLoisFrankel @RepRossSpano @RepMattGaetz @RepBrianMast and @RepWebster https://t.co/lJry3ee5v4

This is outstanding news and proof that bipartisan action achieves results. But the fight does not end here. I'll keep working with my colleagues to protect our coastal communities tourism economy military operations and diverse ocean habitat. https://t.co/VT5nlffshy
My prayers go out to @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS as they begin their recovery from COVID-19. We are with you!

.@SpeakerPelosi's new & unimproved Heroes Act:  👉Provides PPP loans to Planned Parenthood  👉Bans states from legislating voter ID laws  👉Gives illegal immigrants stimulus payments  👉Releases thousands of inmates from prison  👉Defunds police support from previous Heroes Act https://t.co/ioQW50VW4u

.@RepStephMurphy and I are fighting to change this. We asked @SecretaryRoss to consider an additional South Atlantic red snapper season this year should the data from the July season show anglers did not meet the 2020 catch limit. See the full letter here: https://t.co/T28YAurAY1 https://t.co/4ZZcZCideL

Good. He should face increased charges for his abhorrent and cowardly attack on law enforcement. That's why I'm asking @SpeakerPelosi to bring to the floor my bipartisan Protect & Serve Act which creates federal penalties for those who deliberately target police with violence. https://t.co/xzdpYBbe6l
I wish all those observing #YomKippur an easy and meaningful fast. https://t.co/aFbPn4fpfE

There are 15 new cosponsors on my bipartisan legislation! Thank you: @RepBryanSteil @RepMcCaul @RepSteveChabot @RepDaveJoyce @RepPaulCook @RepRiggleman @RepBobGibbs @RepMichaelGuest @RepGolden @RepMcKinley @RepSteveStivers @RepPeteKing @RepMattGaetz @RepBillFlores @RepRossSpano https://t.co/q0DxVbQlKl

BREAKING NEWS: The House just passed the Senate version of my bipartisan legislation to honor a local Northeast Florida hero! Thank you to @RepMichaelWaltz for leading this effort with me.  It now heads to @realDonaldTrump's desk to be signed into law. https://t.co/tLkBwGCL3f

Today the House passed the National Suicide Hotline Designation Act sending it to @realDonaldTrump for signature. This soon-to-be law creates quicker and simpler access to life-saving help because when a person is in crisis every second matters.   More info below! https://t.co/QsUz8ESiKS

Very sad news. Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg was a legend on the Supreme Court and an inspiration to so many. Her commitment to gender equality was unmatched within the legal community. My prayers are with her family and loved ones during this difficult time. https://t.co/lgDNyZdNBN

#ShanahTovah to all the Jewish families gathering tonight to celebrate #RoshHashanah in Northeast Florida and around the world. I wish you and yours a happy and sweet new year! https://t.co/6WhLcsXK9w

Our bipartisan letter also asks @CommerceGov to consider an additional mini recreational red snapper season this year should the data from the July season and the use of best practices show anglers did not meet the 2020 catch limit. Full letter below: https://t.co/T28YAurAY1

This week @RepStephMurphy and I led a letter to @SecretaryRoss to thank him for his quick approval of best practices for red snapper anglers to help reduce release mortality including the use of special fishhooks and descending devices.

Our fisheries are a major economic driver in Northeast Florida and throughout our state. That’s why my colleagues and I have been fighting in a bipartisan way for longer South Atlantic red snapper seasons since I first came to Congress.

Happy Birthday to the @usairforce! Thank you to all airmen both past and present for the many sacrifices and contributions you have made on behalf of America and our freedom. #FlyFightWin https://t.co/mFmL3BxEXy

It seems like every day we hear of yet another ambush attack on law enforcement. I'm asking @SpeakerPelosi to immediately consider my bipartisan Protect and Serve Act. https://t.co/cbfVQddrpD https://t.co/XgQrt6Xizh

While the majority of states currently provide similar protections for pregnant workers implementing these standards at the federal level works to ensure that pregnancy doesn't limit a woman's opportunity for professional success.
This afternoon I voted to pass the Pregnant Workers Fairness Act. This bipartisan commonsense bill provides reasonable accommodations for pregnant women in the workplace. https://t.co/JTxGx5HBac

I'm excited to announce two more cosponsors on my legislation to honor Private First Class Leo C. Chase at the new VA clinic in St. Augustine. Thank you @RepStephMurphy and @RepDarrenSoto! https://t.co/u4Z59YVVQD

After the horrendous attacks on 2 @LASDHQ officers I asked my colleagues to stand with law enforcement & pass the Protect and Serve Act. It’s a bipartisan bill I authored with @RepValDemings to increase penalties on those who target & harm officers. Watch my full remarks below: https://t.co/4UNKPtqc3C
Great to visit with the U.S Ambassador to Israel David Friedman on the eve of a historic peace agreement between Israel UAE and Bahrain. https://t.co/fog04qQ5TV

I’m happy to say my “Rutherford Ride Alongs” are back! This time I visited Standard Feed & Seed in Northeast Florida to learn more about their day-to-day operations and the challenges they face as a growing business. Learn more about my day here: https://t.co/gQta8VJs6R https://t.co/ykvTCALoOZ

On this solemn day we remember the 9/11 terror attacks that shook our nation. May we #NeverForget the lives lost & may their loved ones continue to find peace. God Bless the brave Americans & our allies who have since joined together to destroy terrorism wherever it exists. https://t.co/XjxWrbXyes

Today is #WorldSuicidePreventionDay2020. Sadly 1 person dies by suicide every 2 hours in FL. Together we can change this. Please know you are not alone. Call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-TALK or contact the Crisis Text Line by texting TALK to 741741.

This morning I stopped by the free mobile COVID-19 testing center in Baldwin to check-in with the staff. Thank you to the wonderful nurses doctors and healthcare professionals working around the clock to keep us safe and healthy! https://t.co/tamhO0GrtL

Today's announcement is thanks to bipartisan teamwork by the entire Florida delegation. Since coming to Congress I've tirelessly advocated for extending & expanding the existing moratorium on offshore drilling including introducing the BEACHES in FL Act. https://t.co/KIi7JTeW9Y

HUGE NEWS: : President Trump has officially CLOSED the South Atlantic and Eastern Gulf of Mexico to offshore drilling until 2032. Thank you @realDonaldTrump for protecting our environment ocean ecosystem and coastal economy.

Please join me in wishing a safe deployment to the USS Sioux City as she departs Mayport for important work with our allies. My prayers are with the sailors aboard and their families back home in Northeast Florida. https://t.co/hb7ga5P34E
To learn more please click the following link: https://t.co/5u3tE6lD17

Today I was proud to join @lennycurry and @JFRDJAX to announce a $14.2 million federal grant to support our local firefighters. This exciting investment in NE FL will allow Jax Fire to hire 60 additional firefighters who are truly heroes of our community saving lives every day. https://t.co/00cSI1uqMX
It was great to visit River City Rehabilitation Center in Jacksonville  to learn more about their important life-changing work. Thank you for having me! https://t.co/sKcInFPAPK

I’m pleased to see the @realDonaldTrump Admin announce the expansion of America’s COVID-19 testing capabilities. This initiative will give us the tools we need to help defeat the virus protect vulnerable populations & get our country back to work. https://t.co/0qgCyt96DP

I was proud to be an original cosponsor on my friend @RepAlLawsonJr's legislation last Congress and am thankful for his tireless leadership in getting this over the finish line! #AxHandleSaturday https://t.co/D5JPbSNsmP

Today the @realDonaldTrump Administration rightly recognized the horrors of #AxHandleSaturday and officially designated newly-named James Weldon Johnson Park as part of the African American Civil Rights Network. Please read the full proclamation below. https://t.co/SubKKVx0hM

As Floridians we know the devastation & fear a hurricane can cause on those unfortunate enough to be in its path. My prayers are with the citizens of Louisiana & Texas as #HurricaneLaura continues to move inland. Northeast Florida stands ready to assist when the cleanup begins.
Happy Birthday to the @NatlParkService! America's many national treasures remain protected and cherished thanks to your work and mission. We so appreciate everything you do! https://t.co/tOluegbZsf

Speaker Pelosi called an “emergency” session today to consider legislation to supposedly "save" the USPS. Yet 68 Democrats couldn't even bother to show up. This was a political stunt designed to stoke fears and discredit the election before it happens. My full statement below: https://t.co/ukVx1k9biy

Just received another cosponsor on my Nation's Oldest Port National Heritage Area Act. Thank you @RepCharlieCrist for supporting! https://t.co/s4VRN3dUL0

For decades Mexico has shipped government-subsidized produce into our domestic agricultural markets hurting American fruit & vegetable producers by pushing down the market price. This unlawful practice must be addressed to ensure U.S. producers have access to free & fair trade. https://t.co/KSXg0NzObP
Awesome progress! Thank you @RepMichaelWaltz for joining me on legislation to name this VA facility after a St. Johns County hero. https://t.co/Uuf586b5GR https://t.co/9hLuZfH9fy
Thank you @RepHagedorn for cosponsoring my Protect and Serve Act! https://t.co/5tgMo1Tcb8

Today marks the 100th anniversary of a monumental day in the fight for voting rights for all Americans. As we celebrate this important milestone let us remember trailblazers like Susan B. Anthony Elizabeth Cady Stanton and Lucretia Mott. https://t.co/5N5Y63So5b
Proud to announce two more copsonsors on my Nation's Oldest Port National Heritage Area Act. Thank you @RepRooney and @DrNealDunnFL2 for supporting! https://t.co/b6UTXGp9do

BREAKING NEWS: The Air Force will send F-35s to the Florida Air National Guard’s 125th Fighter Wing in Jacksonville! I have been pushing hard for this and it is so great to see it come to fruition. More news to come!

Outstanding! Thank you @realDonaldTrump for achieving an historic advancement toward peace in the Middle East. Hopefully other Middle East nations will follow the UAE's lead and choose peace and diplomacy. https://t.co/fEFTF70ZVw

Great to be back volunteering with the Barnabas Center as they provide much-needed food assistance to our community. https://t.co/7ENXtxs3KX

Pleased to announce more great news for Jacksonville! @JTAFLA is receiving a $12m grant award from @USDOT to replace old diesel buses w/ clean CNG buses and to repair and upgrade their main facilities. Many thanks to @SecElaineChao for continuing DOT's investment in Jacksonville!

My heart breaks for the 8 Marines & 1 Navy Sailor who lost their lives in a training exercise earlier this week. I pray their loved ones find comfort and peace during this tragic time.   May we never forget the ultimate sacrifice made by these brave men.  https://t.co/iuDhBiHK3F

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for signing this landmark piece of legislation. The #GAOA will help address the backlog of maintenance projects at National Parks across the country including those in our backyard like @TimucuanNPS. https://t.co/rjD6Rkq25a

I was proud to vote "YES" on the #GreatAmericanOutdoorsAct. Today’s landmark legislation ushers in a new era for our public lands and ensures the American pastimes of hunting fishing and hiking remain alive for generations to come. See my full statement below. https://t.co/4iFnFh0qWV

2018 and 2019 were the deadliest years on record for child #heatstroke deaths. It’s going to reach 95 degrees in Northeast Florida this week – make sure to #LookBeforeYouLock and stay vigilant to prevent child #heatstroke tragedies: https://t.co/bqVrd9XPMg

Great to join @SecretaryCarson at @sulzbacherjax in support of the public-private partnerships that are critical in fighting homelessness. We must continue to invest in our communities & provide folks with the support they need to lead independent lives. https://t.co/nn6yrjmNhX

Rep. John Lewis was a man worthy of our admiration and respect. America is a better and freer place because of him and I am grateful for his lifelong fight for equality. May his friends and family find peace during this difficult time. https://t.co/PWtBBo08Vi

Today is the first day of the 2020 red snapper season in the South Atlantic – I hope the fish are biting! In our district alone there are over 100000 anglers who contribute nearly $400 million in economic output annually and support over 3000 jobs.

America should use all of the tools at its disposal to make sure China complies with a transparent investigation and puts safeguards in place to prevent a future pandemic. https://t.co/p2Eti8U2Y2

The Chinese Communist Party must be held accountable for their #coronavirus cover-up. For months they hid data silenced scientists & healthcare professionals & limited information to the rest of the world. They are directly responsible for the nearly 100000 deaths in the U.S.
